=== Ripening Time with Modifiers === {| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" ! Modifier !! Ripe-Wither Time !! Boost Mulch Needed to Ripen |- ! None | 3 hours -
6 hours || --- |- ! Mulch or Sprayduck | 2 hours -
4 hours || 24 mulch |- ! Mulch & Sprayduck | 1 hour 20 mins -
2 hours 40 mins || 16 mulch |}
